pages.title: Kamen Rider Cyclone
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider W: ~The One Who Continues After Z~ (2012, novel)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:w/devices/lostdriver#lostdriver_cyclone)Lostdriver (Cyclone)$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Punch$(li)Speed II$(li)Jump Boost V$(li)Strength IV (with empty hand)$(li)Strength II (with weapon)
